Job Description: What is the role of Technology Team in The Media Ant      The Media Ant is a tech-enabled media agency. For us, technology is at the core of every business and process. We see the tech team as an enabler to drive convenience and efficiency throughout the organization. Being a new generation media agency, the role of the technology team in The Media Ant is to ensure that deep tech is the backbone of everything that we do at The Media Ant.      Few areas of work include building and maintaining the e-commerce portal for media buying, the dashboard to maintain operations and finance, maintaining a large amount of data generated every day, and building intelligence from the user behavior data.
